docs.snippet: Edgar Morales has been sentenced to 50 years in prison for fatally shooting Malenny Mendez, a 10-year old girl, and wounding a man outside a church in the Bronx in 2002....
docs.lead_paragraph: Edgar Morales has been sentenced to 50 years in prison for fatally shooting Malenny Mendez, a 10-year old girl, and wounding a man outside a church in the Bronx in 2002.
docs.abstract: Bronx man Edgar Morales is sentenced to 50 years in prison for 2002 gang shooting that killed 10-year-old bystander Malenny Mendez when stray bullet struck her in the head outside Bronx church.

headline.main: Bronx Man Sentenced to 50 Years in Killing of Girl, 10, in 2002 Gang Fight
headline.print_headline: Bronx Man Sentenced to 50 Years in Killing of Girl, 10, in 2002 Gang Fight

docs.snippet: After 18 months of physical and mental anguish, three-time NASCAR champion Tony Stewart says he's ready to begin a charge for a fourth title at the season-opening Daytona 500....
docs.lead_paragraph: After 18 months of physical and mental anguish, three-time NASCAR champion Tony Stewart says he's ready to begin a charge for a fourth title at the season-opening Daytona 500.

headline.main: Stewart Ready to Move Forward After 'Bad' Stretch
headline.print_headline: Stewart Ready to Move Forward After 'Bad' Stretch

docs.snippet: Mehnaz Afridi, the director of the Holocaust and genocide center at Manhattan College, has drawn praise and criticism from both Jews and Muslims....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mehnaz Afridi, the director of the Holocaust and genocide center at Manhattan College, has drawn praise and criticism from both Jews and Muslims.
docs.abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column highlights work of Mehnaz M Afridi, professor of religion at Manhattan College who teaches courses about both Islam and the Holocaust; Afridi is an observant Muslim who heads college's Holocaust, Genocide and Interfaith Education Center, and her scholarly work receives praise and contempt from both Muslims and Jews.

headline.main: Muslim Scholar, Looking to ‘Speak the Truth,’ Teaches the Holocaust and Islam
headline.print_headline: Muslim Scholar, Looking to ‘Speak the Truth,’ Teaches the Holocaust and Islam
